string.subscription:
If you do not understand this message or you believe it has been sent in error, kindly contact your bishop's admin for clarification.

Please do not respond to this email address as it is unmonitored and will not receive a reply.

On behalf of the Resident Bishop,
Regards
The Administrator
First Love Center HQ
Accra
